meanings.definition: A sequence of three nucleotides in a DNA or RNA molecule.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study trinucleotides to understand genetic information.
meanings.sent2: The trinucleotides in the DNA determine the traits of an organism.
meanings.sent3: The trinucleotides in the genetic code decided to throw a party.
meanings.sent4: Her research uncovered a hidden world within the trinucleotides of the DNA.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used colorful blocks to represent trinucleotides and make learning fun.

meanings.definition: A unit of genetic code consisting of three nucleotides.
meanings.sent1: Each trinucleotide acts as a building block in the genetic code.
meanings.sent2: The trinucleotide sequence determines the order of amino acids in a protein.
meanings.sent3: The trinucleotide trio went on a quest to find their missing friend.
meanings.sent4: In the story of genetics, trinucleotides are the heroes that carry the code.
meanings.sent5: The microscope revealed the intricate dance of trinucleotides within the cell.
